channel.title: TGRoss
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGRoss, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Strength Beneath the Surface
item.description: Hey, Ross here! The market has barely moved over the past five days—but under the surface, it’s telling a different story. We’re still seeing more sto...

item.title: The Market’s Scorecard for May
item.description: Hey, Ross here! The Nasdaq just logged its best May in 35 years, and the S&P 500 wasn’t far behind. History tells us that strong Mays often lead to co...

item.title: How to Exit Before the Crash
item.description: Hey, Ross here! When uncertainty spikes, companies tend to pull their earnings guidance—but that’s not what we’re seeing right now. Only eight S&P 500...

item.title: Bulls Take the Lead
item.description: Hey, Ross here! For the first time in 15 weeks, AAII bulls just outnumbered bears—and that’s a big deal. I’ve studied what typically happens after thi...
